list.abs: His gruff manner made me angry ., 他粗暴的态度让我生气.
the gruff bean , he humorous is not actually prominent , but he did belonged to his humor , although seemed very stupid .憨豆，他的幽默其实并不突出，但是他做了属于自己的幽默，尽管看上去很愚蠢。
A gruff squire on horseback with shiny topboots ., 一个粗暴的绅士 , 足登锃亮的高统马靴 , 跨在马背上.
He could only roar in a gruff voice ., 他仅能以沙哑的声音吼叫着.

auth_sentence.content: Gruffness is his birthright, inherited from a father whose tyrannical strictness became less baffling to Savage as he grew older.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gruffness is his birthright, inherited from a father whose tyrannical strictness became less baffling to Savage as he grew older.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gruffness is his birthright, inherited from a father whose tyrannical strictness became less baffling to Savage as he grew older.

auth_sentence.content: Or perhaps, with a touch of gruffness, since he doesn't like being awakened in the night: I called not; lie down again.
